course_description:
A study of the basic principles governing the formation, performance, enforcement, and imposition of contractual obligations, and the role of these principles in the ordering processes of society.
This course cannot be taken if Contracts LAW 520 has already been taken and vice-versa.
sections: Class Nbr: 1704, Section #: 001, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: M. Goldstein, Status: Open
